attributes.action: Refuse to recieve the olympic torch at Downing street during it's passage through the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It was reported today that Gordon Brown has submitted to pressure from China to be seen to receive the Olympic torch during it's passage through the UK. This is obviously mixing politics with sport-  if this is to be done at all we should be pushing human rights in Tibet not being pushed by this regime to legitimise  it's tactics.
